Hostlayer is here to provide you with reliable, stable and affordable web hosting services. We offer hosting to a large variety of clients ranging from personal websites to large business websites.

We are now offering VPS servers. Our new site launch is set for next week, and we are offering these plans to WebTalkForum users before we release them officially next week.

Virtual Private Servers (VPS) are the very latest in Linux Technology, power by the robust Virtuozzo Control Center. A VPS will provide you with the freedom, space and access of a dedicated server at a fraction of the cost. The VPS Servers will allow you to install and maintain your own line of software while providing you with root access, reboot management and even full VPS restore capabilities.

Choose from any of the below operating systems:

  • Redhat Enterprise Linux 5
  • CentOS 4
  • CentOS 5
  • Fedora
  • Debian

Choose from any of the following control panels:

  • cPanel
  • Plesk
  • Direct Admin
  • Webmin
  • Plain (No Control Panel)
